title: [Extension] OmniFaces for JSF

labels.name: area/quarkiverse
labels.description: This issue/PR is part of the Quarkiverse organization

body:
### Description

Interested in this extension, please +1 via the emoji/reaction feature of GitHub (top right).

I have been keeping this QuarkusFaces repo to demonstrate Java Server Faces (just Faces now) running in Quarkus:
https://github.com/melloware/quarkus-faces

However to make the amazing Java libary OmniFaces work we have to use this extension which is not on Quarkiverse:
https://github.com/adminfaces/quarkus-omnifaces

I simply propose moving this to Quarkiverse and I will maintain it.

### Configuration suggestion

No configuration needed it simply handles wrapping OmniFaces functionality for Quarkus.

### Additional context

I have been using this for 2 years now but the original author isn't very active so I would like this to be in Quarkiverse:

Others have asked for this too See: https://github.com/adminfaces/quarkus-omnifaces/issues/8

OmniFaces ticket: https://github.com/omnifaces/omnifaces/issues/536
